tunelayer.cost¶

To make TuneLayer simple, we minimize the number of cost functions as much as we can. So we encourage you to use TensorFlow’s function. For example, you can implement L1, L2 and sum regularization by tf.contrib.layers.l1_regularizer, tf.contrib.layers.l2_regularizer and tf.contrib.layers.sum_regularizer, see TensorFlow API.

cross_entropy
mean_squared_error
li_regularizer
lo_regularizer
maxnorm_regularizer
maxnorm_o_regularizer
maxnorm_i_regularizer
